content:
BookmarkCallback Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that is called when a Bookmark is resumed.

In this Article

public delegate void BookmarkCallback(NativeActivityContext context, Bookmark bookmark, object value);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
BookmarkCallback
